mapper.insert: insert into base_grade (id, grade_code, student_code, grade_value, record_time, course_code, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gradeCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gradeValue,jdbcType=REAL}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{courseCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update base_grade set grade_code = #{gradeCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, student_code = #{studentCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, grade_value = #{gradeValue,jdbcType=REAL}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, course_code = #{courseCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, grade_code, student_code, grade_value, record_time, course_code, update_time from base_grade
